name: Emberhold Village
description: A highland village nestled in a mountain valley, known for its master blacksmiths and the Ancient Forge
purpose: Crafting settlement centered around the Ancient Forge and the Ember Crystal
history: Founded by master smiths who discovered the Ember Crystal's unique properties

districts.name: Village Square
districts.description: The central area of Emberhold, featuring the Empty Hearth where the Ember Crystal normally resides

points_of_interest.name: The Empty Hearth
points_of_interest.description: A large circular stone platform in the center of the village square, designed to hold the Ember Crystal. The platform now sits empty, with only a few embers still glowing faintly.

points_of_interest.name: Elder's Hut
points_of_interest.description: A modest stone building with intricate carvings, home to Elder Varric who leads the village council.

districts.name: Market District
districts.description: The commercial hub of Emberhold where goods are traded

points_of_interest.name: Thorin's Supplies
points_of_interest.description: A well-stocked trading post run by Merchant Thorin, offering goods from surrounding regions as well as local crafts.
